q: '' The Celtics could use Kevin Garnett 's presence after he sat out his 13th straight game with a strained right knee.`` We miss his leadership out on the floor, his verbal leadership,'' Doc Rivers said. He's the one guy that holds everybody accountable defensively. Leon Powe , Tony Allen and Brian Scalabrine also are sidelined, and Allen Iverson hyperextended his elbow Tuesday night in a loss at Chicago. '' Donald Rumsfeld says Bush invited him into the Oval Office just 15 days after the 9/11 attacks, when the focus was on targeting al-Qaeda in Afghanistan, and ordered a review of war plans for Iraq. Two weeks after the worst terror attacks in our nation's history, those of us in the Department of Defense were full occupied, writes Donald Rumsfeld . Yet Bush called for`` creative'' options to militarily engage Iraq. Donald Rumsfeld twice tried to quit in the wake of the Abu Ghraib scandal, which he says`` left me feeling punched

said David Letterman .`` Being pummeled?'' Anderson Cooper said.`` I don't recommend it. I'd never been hit in the head before.'' He described the scene, saying, People came from all around, surrounding us, punching us, kicking us, trying to rip the clothes off my female producer. It was weird. And we were lucky, frankly.... I would start to slap back and then realize this is going to make it worse. My adrenline was pumping so much. I've never really been in a fight like this or attacked by a mob like this. I thought I was saying calm down, as if they could understand what I was saying.
